hero.headline: Transform Your Fitness Journey with LiftFire
hero.subheadline: The gamified gym tracker that works offline, connects you with friends, and uses AI to optimize your workouts.
hero.copy: Stop letting poor gym WiFi kill your workout tracking. LiftFire works 100% offline while gamifying your fitness journey with XP, achievements, and social challenges. Join thousands of fitness enthusiasts who've made working out addictive.

features.title: Why Choose LiftFire?
features.subtitle: Everything you need for a complete fitness tracking experience

offline.title: Never Miss a Rep
offline.description: Poor gym WiFi? No problem. LiftFire works completely offline, syncing your data when you're back online. Your workouts are always tracked, no matter where you train.

gamification.title: Level Up Your Workouts
gamification.description: Earn XP for every workout, unlock achievements for milestones, and maintain streaks that adapt to your schedule. Make fitness as addictive as your favorite game.

social.title: Train with Friends
social.description: Connect with gym buddies, share achievements, and compete in challenges. Turn your fitness journey into a social experience that keeps you motivated.

items.quote: LiftFire completely changed how I approach the gym. The offline feature is a game-changer!
